trans-unit.source: Test the solution
trans-unit.target: Test the solution

trans-unit.source: In this topic, we test the end-to-end solution by using all the applications and components that we have set up so far.
trans-unit.target: In this topic, we test the end-to-end solution by using all the applications and components that we have set up so far.

trans-unit.source: Before testing the solution, make sure you have set up all the components as required.
trans-unit.target: Before testing the solution, make sure you have set up all the components as required.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have completed the instructions in the step <link xlink:href="a868bed2-401c-4d35-84fd-1fc7cce23ab4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set up the Application to Onboard Partners</link> to create a partner called <embeddedLabel>FourthCoffee</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have completed the instructions in the step <link xlink:href="a868bed2-401c-4d35-84fd-1fc7cce23ab4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set up the Application to Onboard Partners</link> to create a partner called <embeddedLabel>FourthCoffee</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: You must have also provided a logo for FourthCoffee and added a menu item to the catalog to choose from.
trans-unit.target: You must have also provided a logo for FourthCoffee and added a menu item to the catalog to choose from.

trans-unit.source: For the purposes of this demo, the solution works best when only one menu item is added as part of the catalog.
trans-unit.target: For the purposes of this demo, the solution works best when only one menu item is added as part of the catalog.

trans-unit.source: Ensure you have set up the integration layer with all the required components:
trans-unit.target: Ensure you have set up the integration layer with all the required components:

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have created and deployed the <embeddedLabel>PurchaseOrderBridge</embeddedLabel> <token>one-way</token> in <token>af_integration</token>, as described in the step <link xlink:href="81722b9a-3958-4687-b6cc-d14be2d9d251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create the BizTalk Service project to process purchase orders</link>.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have created and deployed the <embeddedLabel>PurchaseOrderBridge</embeddedLabel> <token>one-way</token> in <token>af_integration</token>, as described in the step <link xlink:href="81722b9a-3958-4687-b6cc-d14be2d9d251" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create the BizTalk Service project to process purchase orders</link>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have created and deployed the <embeddedLabel>InvoiceBridge</embeddedLabel> <token>one-way</token> in <token>af_integration</token>, as described in the step <link xlink:href="c8ebf10b-d76d-4885-9f4a-fbe8e2ebe8ac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create the BizTalk Service Project to Process Invoices</link>.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have created and deployed the <embeddedLabel>InvoiceBridge</embeddedLabel> <token>one-way</token> in <token>af_integration</token>, as described in the step <link xlink:href="c8ebf10b-d76d-4885-9f4a-fbe8e2ebe8ac" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create the BizTalk Service Project to Process Invoices</link>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have created an agreement to process messages exchanged between Contoso, Ltd.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have created an agreement to process messages exchanged between Contoso, Ltd.

trans-unit.source: and Fourth Coffee, as described in the step <link xlink:href="c6f3a867-cf2c-47b4-85be-a1ffc2becd68" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a Trading Partner Agreement</link>.
trans-unit.target: and Fourth Coffee, as described in the step <link xlink:href="c6f3a867-cf2c-47b4-85be-a1ffc2becd68" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create a Trading Partner Agreement</link>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have created, deployed, and started a <token>azure_1</token> worker role that polls an <token>azure_2</token> blob container and routes purchase order messages to send bridge in the EDI agreement, as described in the step <link xlink:href="e3b16ab7-7f26-4a29-9d86-87c95fa0f8d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an Azure Worker Role to Poll the Azure Blob</link>.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have created, deployed, and started a <token>azure_1</token> worker role that polls an <token>azure_2</token> blob container and routes purchase order messages to send bridge in the EDI agreement, as described in the step <link xlink:href="e3b16ab7-7f26-4a29-9d86-87c95fa0f8d4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create an Azure Worker Role to Poll the Azure Blob</link>.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have created and started the application that is used by Fourth Coffee to accept or reject orders, as described in the step <link xlink:href="dd9385be-73a8-42e7-885d-6257e5421b6c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create the Fourth Coffee Application to Receive Orders and Return Invoice</link>.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have created and started the application that is used by Fourth Coffee to accept or reject orders, as described in the step <link xlink:href="dd9385be-73a8-42e7-885d-6257e5421b6c" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Create the Fourth Coffee Application to Receive Orders and Return Invoice</link>.

trans-unit.source: While creating a trading partner agreement you must have provided a relay endpoint where suspended messages that fail processing are routed to.
trans-unit.target: While creating a trading partner agreement you must have provided a relay endpoint where suspended messages that fail processing are routed to.

trans-unit.source: Make sure you have an application listening to that relay endpoint.
trans-unit.target: Make sure you have an application listening to that relay endpoint.

trans-unit.source: For this purpose, you can use the sample tool, <externalLink><linkText>Azure BizTalk Services EAI Sample Tools - Message Receiver</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=389581</linkUri></externalLink> provided with <token>af_integration</token>.
trans-unit.target: For this purpose, you can use the sample tool, <externalLink><linkText>Azure BizTalk Services EAI Sample Tools - Message Receiver</linkText><linkUri>http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=389581</linkUri></externalLink> provided with <token>af_integration</token>.

trans-unit.source: On a Windows 8 computer, start the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar</embeddedLabel> application.
trans-unit.target: On a Windows 8 computer, start the <embeddedLabel>CloudCar</embeddedLabel> application.

trans-unit.source: From the Visual Studio Solution Explorer, right-click the solution name and select <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: From the Visual Studio Solution Explorer, right-click the solution name and select <embeddedLabel>Build</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Once the build is complete, run the simulator to test the application:
trans-unit.target: Once the build is complete, run the simulator to test the application:

trans-unit.source: In the Simulator, tap the <embeddedLabel>Contoso CloudCar</embeddedLabel> icon from the Start screen to launch the application.
trans-unit.target: In the Simulator, tap the <embeddedLabel>Contoso CloudCar</embeddedLabel> icon from the Start screen to launch the application.

trans-unit.source: Once the application starts, tap the <embeddedLabel>Restaurant</embeddedLabel> icon.
trans-unit.target: Once the application starts, tap the <embeddedLabel>Restaurant</embeddedLabel> icon.

trans-unit.source: When prompted whether the application can use your current location, select <embeddedLabel>Allow</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: When prompted whether the application can use your current location, select <embeddedLabel>Allow</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: A map page launches and zooms into your current location.
trans-unit.target: A map page launches and zooms into your current location.

trans-unit.source: The map page shows the location of a nearby Fourth Coffee restaurant.
trans-unit.target: The map page shows the location of a nearby Fourth Coffee restaurant.

trans-unit.source: The map uses the same logo icon to point the location of Fourth Coffee that you provided while creating a partner in the <link xlink:href="a868bed2-401c-4d35-84fd-1fc7cce23ab4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set up the Application to Onboard Partners</link>.
trans-unit.target: The map uses the same logo icon to point the location of Fourth Coffee that you provided while creating a partner in the <link xlink:href="a868bed2-401c-4d35-84fd-1fc7cce23ab4" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Set up the Application to Onboard Partners</link>.

trans-unit.source: Tap the logo icon on the map to see the menu for the Fourth Coffee restaurant.
trans-unit.target: Tap the logo icon on the map to see the menu for the Fourth Coffee restaurant.

trans-unit.source: Select an item from the menu to see the price and description.
trans-unit.target: Select an item from the menu to see the price and description.

trans-unit.source: Provide the required details and tap <embeddedLabel>Submit Order</embeddedLabel> to place the order.
trans-unit.target: Provide the required details and tap <embeddedLabel>Submit Order</embeddedLabel> to place the order.

trans-unit.source: If the order is successfully submitted, a message is displayed on the screen.
trans-unit.target: If the order is successfully submitted, a message is displayed on the screen.

trans-unit.source: Switch to the computer where you are running the Fourth Coffee application to approve or reject orders.
trans-unit.target: Switch to the computer where you are running the Fourth Coffee application to approve or reject orders.

trans-unit.source: Because that application is represented using a console application in this tutorial, you must see a new X12 purchase order message on the console.
trans-unit.target: Because that application is represented using a console application in this tutorial, you must see a new X12 purchase order message on the console.

trans-unit.source: Carefully study the contents of the purchase order.
trans-unit.target: Carefully study the contents of the purchase order.

trans-unit.source: It must contain an order ID, customer name, customer e-mail address, order details, etc.
trans-unit.target: It must contain an order ID, customer name, customer e-mail address, order details, etc.

trans-unit.source: In the console application, at the prompt to accept or reject orders, enter “<userInput>y</userInput>” to accept the order
trans-unit.target: In the console application, at the prompt to accept or reject orders, enter “<userInput>y</userInput>” to accept the order

trans-unit.source: Switch to the computer where you have SQL Server installed and connect to the <embeddedLabel>CloudCarDatabase</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Switch to the computer where you have SQL Server installed and connect to the <embeddedLabel>CloudCarDatabase</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Run a SELECT query on the <embeddedLabel>Orders</embeddedLabel> table.
trans-unit.target: Run a SELECT query on the <embeddedLabel>Orders</embeddedLabel> table.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, run a SELECT query on the <embeddedLabel>Invoice</embeddedLabel> table in the <embeddedLabel>CloudCarDatabase</embeddedLabel>.
trans-unit.target: Similarly, run a SELECT query on the <embeddedLabel>Invoice</embeddedLabel> table in the <embeddedLabel>CloudCarDatabase</embeddedLabel>.

trans-unit.source: Finally, you must have received an e-mail with the order details at the e-mail address you specified while placing the order.
trans-unit.target: Finally, you must have received an e-mail with the order details at the e-mail address you specified while placing the order.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the e-mail resemble the following:
trans-unit.target: The contents of the e-mail resemble the following:

trans-unit.source: With this, you have tested an end-to-end solution where a partner on boards itself on another partner’s <token>af_integration</token> environment, the hosting partner sets up an integration layer using <token>af_integration</token> and other <token>winazure</token> technologies, and the customers use a mobile modern Windows 8 application to use the services.
trans-unit.target: With this, you have tested an end-to-end solution where a partner on boards itself on another partner’s <token>af_integration</token> environment, the hosting partner sets up an integration layer using <token>af_integration</token> and other <token>winazure</token> technologies, and the customers use a mobile modern Windows 8 application to use the services.
